metadata.title: CVE-2018-19837 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In LibSass prior to 3.5.5, Sass::Eval::operator()(Sass::Binary_Expression*)inside eval.cpp allows attackers to cause a denial-of-service resultingfrom stack consumption via a crafted sass file, because of certainincorrect parsing of '%' as a modulo operator in parser.cpp.

criterions.comment: libsass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
